TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HtmlForm extends System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlContainerControl

summary.span: 允許以程式設計方式存取伺服器上的 HTML 項目。

span.span: Provides programmatic access to the HTML element on the server.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項為 Web Form 網頁上的伺服器控制項的容器。The control is a container for server controls on a Web Forms page. 張貼至伺服器的所有伺服器控制項必須都放置開頭和結尾標記之間控制項。All server controls that post back to the server must be placed between the opening and closing tags of an control. > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET 允許只有一個設為作用中的 Web Form 網頁上的控制項。ASP.NET allows only a single control to be active on a Web Forms page. 如果有多個作用中Web Form 網頁，通用語言執行平台上的控制項將會擲回例外狀況，當您要求的頁面。If there is more than one active control on a Web Forms page, the common language runtime will throw an exception when you request the page. 不過，您可以使用控制 where 每個物件包含一個控制項，因為只有一個在任何指定時間為作用中。You can, however, use a control where each object contains one control, because only one is active at any given time. 您可以控制行為控制項設定其屬性。You can control the behavior of the control by setting its properties. 指定的編碼類型表單的資料，請設定屬性。To specify the encoding type for the form's data, set the property. 方法 (`GET`或`POST`) 瀏覽器用來公佈到伺服器的表單資料的設定，來指定處理屬性。The method (`GET` or `POST`) that a browser uses to post form data to the server for processing is specified by setting the property. > [!CAUTION] > 預設的情況下， 屬性設定為 `POST`。By default, the property is set to `POST`. 您可以修改此屬性值`GET`，但這可能會中斷的內建的狀態，並回傳 ASP.NET 網頁架構所提供的服務。You can modify the value of this property to `GET`, but this might break the built-in state and postback services provided by the ASP.NET page framework. 您可以設定這些控制項實作張貼到不同的目標頁面的介面。You can configure controls that implement the interface to post to a different target page. 這被指跨網頁回傳。This is referred to as cross-page posting. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[跨網頁張貼在 ASP.NET Web Form](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b)。For more information, see [Cross-Page Posting in ASP.NET Web Forms](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fedf234e-b7c4-4644-a9e8-c1c0870b043b). 如需執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱建構函式。For a list of initial property values for an instance of , see the constructor. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來建立簡單的表單。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a simple form. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

Public Sub New ()
public: HtmlForm();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 下表顯示的執行個體的初始屬性值。The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of . |屬性Property|初始值Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| ||[表單] 常值字串。The "form" literal string.| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立的新執行個體控制，並將它放在網頁上。The following code example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and place it on the Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/CS/htmlformctorcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormCtor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormCtor/VB/htmlformctorvb.aspx#1)]

.property instance string Action
Public Property Action As String
public: property System::String ^ Action { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 HTML 表單的 action 屬性。

span.span: Gets or sets the action attribute of the HTML form.

value.span: HTML 表單的 action 屬性。

span.span: The action attribute of the HTML form.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您使用屬性，當您重新撰寫原始要求的 URL，但您想要保留的 HTML 表單的 action 屬性的原始 URL。You use the property when you rewrite the URL of the original request but you want to retain the original URL for the action attribute of the HTML form. 設定屬性設為您想要保留的 url 值。Set the property to the value of the URL that you want to retain.

.property instance string ClientID
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property ClientID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ ClientID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] 為 控制項產生的控制項識別碼

span.span: Gets the control identifier that is generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control

value.span: 所產生的控制項識別碼[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]如控制項。

span.span: The control identifier generated by [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免命名衝突，當控制項的多個執行個體，就會轉譯[!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]會自動產生唯一頁面上的每個控制項的值。To prevent naming conflicts when multiple instances of a control are rendered, [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] automatically generates a unique value for each control on a page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 屬性 (Property)。For more information, see the property.

Protected Overrides Function CreateControlCollection () As ControlCollection

summary.span: 為 控制項建立新的 集合。

span.span: Creates a new collection for the control.

returns.span: ，包含 控制項的子伺服器控制項。

span.span: A that contains the control's child server controls.

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultButton { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultButton
Public Property DefaultButton As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultButton { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定 控制項的子控制項，它會在按下 ENTER 鍵時引發回傳。

span.span: Gets or sets the child control of the control that causes postback when the ENTER key is pressed.

value.span: 載入 時，顯示為預設按鈕的按鈕控制項 。

span.span: The of the button control to display as the default button when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您指定的使用者可以使回傳 （例如文字方塊） 形式的輸入控制項中按 ENTER 鍵。The property lets you specify that users can cause a postback by pressing ENTER in an input control in the form (such as a text box). 您可以指定為預設按鈕的任何控制項衍生自介面除了控制項。You can specify as a default button any control that derives from the interface except the control. 如果所參考的控制項屬性不是衍生自、擲回例外狀況。If the control that is referenced by the property does not derive from , an exception is thrown. 如果您使用主版頁面，而且設定屬性從 內容 頁面上，使用屬性 按鈕。If you are using master pages and you set the property from a content page, use the property of the button. 如需主版頁面的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 主版頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b)。For more information about master pages, see [ASP.NET Master Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/4e53eedf-8304-4e7a-aed1-691a2623b28b). 屬性可能會導致回傳，在下列案例：The property might not cause a postback in the following scenarios: - 當焦點是在表單中的輸入控制項之外，請按下 ENTER。Pressing ENTER when focus is outside the input controls in the form. 預設的回傳動作不保證會觸發。The default postback action is not guaranteed to be triggered. - 當焦點是在多行文字方塊中，按下 ENTER 鍵。Pressing ENTER when focus is inside a multi-line text box. 在多行文字方塊中，預期的行為是在文字方塊中，按下 ENTER 鍵會建立新的一行。In a multi-line text box, the expected behavior is that pressing ENTER creates a new line in the text box. 在某些瀏覽器中，按下 ENTER 鍵多行文字 方塊中觸發程序內部的回傳。In some browsers, pressing ENTER inside a multi-line text box triggers a postback. 在此情況下，如果您想要改為建立新的一行輸入，您可以輸入控制項来附加的 JavaScript 函式。In that case, if you want ENTER to create a new line instead, you can attach a JavaScript function to the input control. 此指令碼應該擷取 ENTER 鍵，並停止回傳。The script should capture the ENTER key and stop the postback. 例如，您可以使用要加入的用戶端指令碼的屬性集合`onKeyPress`事件。For example, you can use the property collection to add client script for the `onKeyPress` event. - 指定為預設按鈕的控制項。Specifying a control as a default button. 只有和控制項都可支援。Only and controls are supported. - 變更以程式設計方式在非同步回傳期間的屬性。Changing the property programmatically during an asynchronous postback. 可以藉由新增一或多個頁面上啟用非同步回傳至頁面的控制項。Asynchronous postbacks can be enabled on a page by adding one or more controls to the page. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[UpdatePanel 控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a)和[局部網頁呈現概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49)。For more information, see [UpdatePanel Control Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/29a2265d-9674-4c19-b70e-e5560ee9689a) and [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5c12736d-d9e9-464a-9388-3fe0f9f49e49). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何設定屬性來設定導致回傳的預設控制項。The following example shows how to set the property to set the default control that causes a postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 當做預設按鈕參考的控制項不是 型別。

span.span: The control referenced as the default button is not of the type .

MemberSignature.Value: public string DefaultFocus { get; set; }
.property instance string DefaultFocus
Public Property DefaultFocus As String
public: property System::String ^ DefaultFocus { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定表單上的控制項，此控制項在載入 控制項時，會顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項。

span.span: Gets or sets the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded.

value.span: 表單上的控制項 ，此控制項在載入 時，會顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項。

span.span: The of the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the is loaded.
The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來存取表單顯示為具有輸入控制項上的控制項焦點時載入控制項。Use the property to access the control on the form to display as the control with input focus when the control is loaded. 可以選取控制項顯示視覺提示，表示它們具有焦點。Controls that can be selected are displayed with a visual cue indicating that they have the focus. 例如，插入點放在其內部顯示具有焦點的控制項。For example, a control with focus is displayed with the insertion point positioned inside of it. 擁有焦點的控制項也可以設定使用或方法。The control with focus can also be set using the or methods. 這些方法的優先順序高於屬性。These methods have precedence over the property. 若其中一種方法會呼叫以將控制項設定焦點，值屬性會被忽略。If either of these methods are called to set the control with focus, the value of the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性，以指定的控制項在表單上顯示為具有輸入焦點的控制項，當表單載入時。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property to display a specified control on a form as the control with input focus when the form loads. 當`Form1`呈現，請注意，插入點位於`TextBox1`，這表示，`TextBox1`是具有焦點的控制項。When `Form1` renders, notice that the insertion point is positioned in `TextBox1`, indicating that `TextBox1` is the control with focus. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/CS/htmlform.defaultbuttoncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.DefaultButton#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.DefaultButton/VB/htmlform.defaultbuttonvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Enctype { get; set; }
.property instance string Enctype
Public Property Enctype As String
public: property System::String ^ Enctype { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定將表單資料傳送至伺服器時瀏覽器所使用的編碼類型。

span.span: Gets or sets the encoding type a browser uses when posting the form's data to the server.
A string that contains the encoding type.

value.span: 預設值是空字串 ("")，表示使用了瀏覽器的預設內容類型。

span.span: The default value is an empty string (""), indicating that the browser's default content type is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以指定的編碼類型瀏覽器使用來張貼至伺服器的資料。Use the property to specify the encoding type a browser uses to post data back to the server. 下表顯示常見的編碼類型。The following table shows the common encoding types. |編碼類型Encoding type|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |application/x-www-form-urlencodedapplication/x-www-form-urlencoded|表單資料編碼為名稱/值組。Form data is encoded as name/value pairs. 這是標準的編碼格式。This is the standard encoding format.| |multipart/form-datamultipart/form-data|表單資料是以個別的組件的每個頁面上的控制項的訊息編碼。Form data is encoded as a message with a separate part for each control on the page.| |文字/純文字text/plain|表單資料是以純文字，而不需要任何控制或格式字元編碼。Form data is encoded in plain text, without any control or formatting characters.| 如需編碼類型的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium (W3C 網站](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)。For more information on encoding types, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C Web site](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以指定的編碼類型瀏覽器使用將資料傳送至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify the encoding type the browser uses to send data back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Method { get; set; }
.property instance string Method
Public Property Method As String
public: property System::String ^ Method { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出瀏覽器如何將表單資料傳至伺服器做處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server for processing.

value.span: 字串，指出瀏覽器如何將表單資料傳至伺服器。

span.span: A string that indicates how a browser posts form data to the server.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來指定瀏覽器至伺服器進行處理所傳送的表單資料。Use this property to specify how the browser sends form data to the server for processing. 所有瀏覽器支援兩個常見的方法是`GET`和`POST`。The two common methods supported by all browsers are `GET` and `POST`. > [!CAUTION] > 您可以覆寫預設值，這個屬性與使用`GET`方法，而非`POST`。You can override the default value of this property and use the `GET` method instead of `POST`. 不過，因為`GET`要求受到中多少資料它們可以包含，請使用`GET`方法可能在某些情況下，會造成回傳和狀態管理所提供的功能由 ASP.NET 網頁架構失敗。However, because `GET` requests are limited in how much data they can include, using the `GET` method can, in some cases, cause the postback and state management capabilities provided by the ASP.NET page framework to fail. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性可指定表單資料會回傳至伺服器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify that form data is posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/CS/htmlformcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm/VB/htmlformvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual string Name { get; set; }
.property instance string Name
Public Overridable Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得 控制項的識別項名稱。

span.span: Gets the identifier name for the control.

value.span: 包含 識別項名稱的字串。

span.span: A string that contains the identifier name for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來判斷唯一識別項名稱控制項。Use the property to determine the unique identifier name for an control. 在此實作中，取得這個屬性傳回的值屬性。In this implementation, getting this property returns the value of the property. 不過，將屬性設定不會指派值給屬性。However, setting the property does not assign a value to the property. 將屬性設定不會指派值給這個屬性因為屬性必須有相同的值屬性。Setting the property does not assign a value to this property because the property must have the same value as the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`屬性不 XHTML 相容的屬性，而且不會呈現 asp.net 不論`xhtmlConformance`設定。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and is not rendered by ASP.NET regardless of the `xhtmlConformance` setting.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnInit (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnInit(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnInit (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnInit(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: A that contains event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當收到通知方法中，Web 伺服器控制項都必須執行建立及設定執行個體所需的任何初始化步驟。When notified by the method, Web server controls must perform any initialization steps that are required to create and set up an instance. 在此階段的伺服器控制項的生命週期中，控制項的檢視狀態尚未填入。In this stage of the server control's life cycle, the control's view state has yet to be populated. 此外，您無法存取其他伺服器控制項，呼叫這個方法時，無論它是子系或父這個控制項。Additionally, you cannot access other server controls when this method is called, regardless of whether it is a child or parent to this control. 不保證會建立並準備好存取其他伺服器控制項。Other server controls are not guaranteed to be created and ready for access. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 此外，呼叫基底類別的方法可確保控制項正確地設定為網頁表單和網頁的檢視狀態會保存。

span.span: Additionally, calling the base class's method ensures that the control is properly set as the Web page form and the page's view state is persisted.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void OnPreRender (EventArgs e);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void OnPreRender(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub OnPreRender (e As EventArgs)
protected public: override void OnPreRender(EventArgs ^ e);

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 控制項的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呼叫之前轉譯控制項。The method is called just prior to rendering the control. 如果屬性設定為`true`、方法註冊智慧瀏覽指令碼檔參考，讓它取得呈現。If the property is set to `true`, the method registers the smart navigation script file reference so that it gets rendered. > [!NOTE] > 屬性已被取代，在 ASP.NET 2.0 版。The property has been deprecated in ASP.NET version 2.0.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override void Render (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter output);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void Render(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter output) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub Render (output As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void Render(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ output);

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項呈現為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法都可呈現 HTML`

exception.span: 控制項呈現時一定要有 執行個體的參考。

span.span: The control is not rendered without a reference to the instance.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確呈現控制項的子控制項。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void RenderAttributes (System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer);

Protected Overrides Sub RenderAttributes (writer As HtmlTextWriter)

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 將 控制項的屬性轉譯為指定的 物件。

span.span: Renders the control's attributes to the specified object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會使用方法來檢查控制項的屬性，以確保它們可以在開頭標記中同時呈現`
`HTML 項目。The method uses the method to check the control's attributes to ensure that they can be rendered in the opening tag of a `` HTML element. 此外，方法呈現`method`， `action`，和`onsubmit`屬性控制項。Additionally, the method renders the `method`, `action`, and `onsubmit` attributes of the control. 如果在中設定的控制項 ID屬性未實作介面，擲回例外狀況。If the control ID set in the property does not implement the interface, an exception is thrown. 主要由控制項開發人員擴充功能的使用方法控制項。The method is used primarily by control developers extending the functionality of the control.

exception.span: 屬性中設定的控制項 ID 不是 型別。

span.span: The control ID set in the property is not of the type .

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確呈現控制項的屬性。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's attributes are correctly rendered.

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance void RenderChildren(class System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter writer) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Sub RenderChildren (writer As HtmlTextWriter)
protected public: override void RenderChildren(System::Web::UI::HtmlTextWriter ^ writer);

span.span: The that receives the rendered content.

summary.span: 呈現 控制項的子控制項。

span.span: Renders the child controls of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法呈現用戶端指令碼，以確保瀏覽器焦點設在指定的控制項屬性。The method renders client script to ensure that the browser focus is set to the control specified in the property. > [!NOTE] > 所指定的控制項屬性會優先於所指定的控制項屬性。A control specified by the property takes precedence over a control specified by the property.

exception.span: Web 網頁有一個以上的伺服器端 標記。

span.span: The Web page has more than one server-side tag.

para.span: 在覆寫方法在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法以便正確呈現控制項的子控制項。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that the control's child controls are correctly rendered.

param.span: 接收表單控制項內容的 。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual bool SubmitDisabledControls { get; set; }
.property instance bool SubmitDisabledControls
Public Overridable Property SubmitDisabledControls As Boolean
public: virtual property bool SubmitDisabledControls { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值 (Boolean)，指出是否要強制用戶端上已停用的控制項送出其值，讓控制項在網頁回傳至伺服器時保留其值。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value indicating whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values, allowing them to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server.

value.span: 如果用戶端上停用的控制項被強制送出其值，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if controls disabled on the client are forced to submit their values; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來指定是否強制用戶端提交其值在網頁回傳後停用的控制項。Use the property to specify whether to force controls disabled on the client to submit their values when the page posts back. 這可讓網頁回傳至伺服器之後，仍然保留其值停用的控制項。This allows the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server. 當屬性設定為`false`，表單上的控制項已停用用戶端指令碼會提交到伺服器網頁回傳後下一次。When the property is set to `false`, controls on the form that have been disabled using client script will not be submitted to the server the next time the page posts back. 如此一來，停用的控制項所儲存的任何值都會遺失。As a result, any values stored by the disabled controls are lost. 若要允許停用的頁面回傳至伺服器之後，仍然保留其值的控制項，請設定屬性`true`。To allow the disabled controls to preserve their values after the page posts back to the server, set the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定屬性在表單`true`造成頁面回傳至伺服器之後，保留其值的用戶端指令碼停用的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to set the property on a form to `true` to cause controls disabled by client script to maintain their values after the page posts back to the server. 在此範例中，如果您設定屬性`false`，然後按一下 **回傳** 按鈕，在 HTML 文字方塊中的文字遺失且無法再選取 HTML 核取方塊。In this example, if you set the property to `false` and then click the **Post back** button, the text in the HTML text box is lost and the HTML check box is no longer selected. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/CS/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolscs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.SubmitDisabledControls/VB/htmlform.submitdisabledcontrolsvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public string Target { get; set; }
.property instance string Target
Public Property Target As String
public: property System::String ^ Target { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定框架 (Frame) 或視窗，在其中呈現張貼至伺服器的資訊結果。

span.span: Gets or sets the frame or window in which to render the results of information that is posted to the server.

value.span: 瀏覽器視窗或框架，顯示張貼至伺服器的資訊結果。

span.span: The browser window or frame that displays the results of the information posted to the server.

value.span: 預設為空字串 ("")，會重新整理擁有焦點的視窗或框架。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), which refreshes the window or frame with focus.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，指定的目標視窗或框架，顯示結果的張貼資訊到伺服器。Use the property to specify the target window or frame that displays the results of the information that is posted to the server. 重新導向張貼至伺服器的結果是資訊的進階的工作。Redirecting the results of the information posted to the server is an advanced task. 建議您不要使用這個屬性只是為了回傳。Using this property simply to post back is not recommended. > [!NOTE] > 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。The property renders as a `target` attribute. `target`屬性`form`XHTML 1.1 中不允許項目。The `target` attribute on `form` elements is not allowed in XHTML 1.1. 因此，如果呈現的標記必須符合 XHTML 標準，或必須符合協助工具標準，請勿設定屬性。Therefore, if the rendered markup must conform to XHTML standards or must conform to accessibility standards, do not set the property. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97)和[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)。For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1b78d416-66bb-43a5-ac77-c703aab55b97) and [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13). 值必須以中範圍的 A 到 Z （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，其中以底線開頭字母為開頭。The value must begin with a letter in the range of A to Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore. |目標值Target value|描述Description| |------------------|-----------------| |`_blank`|在無框架的新視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in a new window without frames.| |`_parent`|在即時父代框架組中呈現內容。Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.| |`_search`|在搜尋窗格中呈現內容。Renders the content in the search pane.| |`_self`|在擁有焦點 (Focus) 的框架中呈現內容。Renders the content in the frame with focus.| |`_top`|在無框架的完整視窗中呈現內容。Renders the content in the full window without frames.| > [!NOTE] > 請查閱您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否支援 `_search` 值。Check your browser documentation to determine if the `_search` value is supported. 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 (含) 以後版本支援 `_search` 目標值。For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the `_search` target value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用回傳至伺服器的屬性，以指定新 unframed 視窗以顯示資訊的結果。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to specify a new, unframed window to display the results of the information posted back to the server. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/CS/htmlformtargetcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlFormTarget#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlFormTarget/VB/htmlformtargetvb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override string UniqueID { get; }
.property instance string UniqueID
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property UniqueID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ UniqueID { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得指派給 控制項的唯一程式設計識別項。

span.span: Gets the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

value.span: 指派給 控制項的唯一程式設計識別項。

span.span: The unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來取得指派給的唯一程式設計識別碼控制項。Use the property to get the unique programmatic identifier assigned to the control. 這個屬性會覆寫基底實作中內含控制項時，傳回的常數值-實作以外，請在頁面上，例如自訂的伺服器控制項的物件。This property overrides the base implementation to return a constant value when the control is contained in an -implemented object other than a page, such as a custom server control. 頁面上，而值是否命名容器控制項的會傳回屬性。If the naming container is a page, the value of the control's property is returned. 屬性和屬性一律傳回相同的值。The property and the property always return the same value. 這非常有用時需要在瀏覽器上呈現控制項控制項的和相同的屬性。This is useful when the control is rendered on a browser that requires the control's and properties to be the same. 若要讓同步處理，這些屬性屬性一律會傳回的值屬性。To keep these properties synchronized, the property always returns the value of the property. > [!NOTE] > `name`屬性不是 XHTML 相容的屬性和預設情況下則不會呈現 asp.net。The `name` attribute is not an XHTML-compliant attribute and by default is not rendered by ASP.NET. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用要擷取的唯一識別碼屬性控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to retrieve the unique identifier for an control. [!code-aspx-csharp[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/CS/htmlform.uniqueidcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[HtmlForm.UniqueID#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HtmlForm.UniqueID/VB/htmlform.uniqueidvb.aspx#1)]
